title: Senior Software Engineer, CoinDesk Indices (Remote - LATAM)
content:
CoinDesk is the most trusted media, events, indices and data company for the global crypto economy.  Since 2013, CoinDesk Media has led the story of the future of money and investing, illuminating the transformation in society and culture that comes with it. Our award-winning team of journalists delivers news and unparalleled insights that bring transparency, comprehension and context. CoinDesk Events gathers the global crypto, blockchain and Web3 communities at annual events such as Consensus, the world's largest and longest-running crypto festival. CoinDesk Indices offers expertise in digital asset indices, data and research to educate and empower investors. For more information on CoinDesk media and events, please visit coindesk.com and for breaking headlines, data and indices visit coindeskmarkets.com.About CoinDesk Indices
CoinDesk Indices (CDI), a subsidiary of CoinDesk, has been the leading provider of digital asset indices by AUM since 2014. We are driven by precision, rigor, research and a desire to educate the marketplace and empower investors. CoinDesk, a media, events, data, and indices company, is the most influential and trusted platform for the global crypto ecosystem.
CDI has three distinct product lines: single-asset reference indices, broad market and sector indices, and systematic strategy indices. The CoinDesk Bitcoin Price Index (XBX) has the longest index track record and underlies the world’s largest digital asset products. Our broad market and sector indices offer the most comprehensive broad market benchmarks, and our investible sectors are constructed using CDI’s industry-adopted taxonomy. Our systematic strategy indices help investors target specific outcomes.
About The Role 
As a Senior Software Engineer on the CDI Engineering team, you will be responsible for the designing, building, and testing new and existing features on the Core Platform that empowers our business. You will collaborate closely with Engineering, Governance, Product, & Sales teams to deliver against the technical roadmap and ensure our backend services maintain high performance and scalability. Our clients utilize CDI’s products to inform their investment strategies which means platform security & reliability is mission-critical. 
We’re looking for self-motivated teammates that are passionate about code quality and excited to be a part of our mission - even if you’re a crypto novice. If this sounds like you, than we’d love to hear from you! 
Responsibilities:
Design, develop, test, implement, and maintain new and existing backend features using Python/NodeJS
Partner with Product, Governance, and Sales teams to deliver against product roadmap
Define back-end requirements for tools that enhance the analysis, reporting and display of indices data. Contribute to long-form projects anchored on data visualizations and interactivity
Collaborate with software architects and technical leads to ensure decisions are made with future scalability and reliability as top of mind 
Design and build infrastructure components that optimize for the developer experience as well as platform performance; reliability, scalability, security
Troubleshoot and debugs complex issues; identifies and implements solutions
Contribute technical documentation related to software architecture, coding frameworks, components, and technical decisions + trade offs
Participate in code reviews and thoughtfully provide constructive feedback
Mentor fellow engineering teammates 
About You
6+ years of software engineering experience designing, developing, and maintaining distributed systems at scale
Proficiency and demonstrated experience in the following technologies:
Programming: Python (required), experience with Java and/or C++ is a plus
Expertise with Object-Oriented principles and other software design paradigms
Database: SQL and/or NoSQL
Cloud-based development: ECS, Lambda
Third party tools: Kafka, Redis
Web Services/API Layer: REST/JSON
Build/dev tools: Docker, Git
Bonus points for familiarity with modern front end technologies and frameworks; React/NextJs
Experience in DevOps methodologies, including Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment, Trunk Based Development
Well versed in Agile Methodologies with previous experience working in a Scrum environment
Ownership, accountability, efficient verbal & written communication
Full Professional Proficiency in English is required
Note: This is a full-time employment position. Due to the required working hours and co-location of the rest of the team, only candidates who are currently based in Colombia will be considered for this opportunity.EQUAL OPPORTUNITY
In an effort to attract, retain, develop and promote the most qualified individuals, CoinDesk is committed to treating all applicants and employees in a nondiscriminatory manner with respect to the terms and conditions of employment, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, sex, national or ethnic origin, ancestry, age, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status/service, physical or mental disability, or any other classification protected by applicable law. This mandate governs all aspects of employment, including recruitment, selection, promotion, training, education, social and recreation programs, compensation, discipline, termination and access to benefits.
For more information on our DEI initiatives, please visit: https://www.coindesk.com/dei/.
ACCOMMODATION
CoinDesk is also committed to providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities. If you need a reasonable accommodation because of a disability for any part of the application process, please send an e-mail to accomodations@coindesk.com and let us know the nature of your request.
 
Please note that only a member of CoinDesk’s Talent Acquisition team will reach out to you directly from an @coindesk.com or @coindesk-indices.com email in regards to any and all opportunities at CoinDesk. Disregard emails from any other addresses or persons. If you’re selected to move onto the next phase of our hiring process, a member of our team will reach out to guide you through our interview process. We look forward to connecting!
